attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is all for our British troops ie Army, R.A.F etc fighting in afghan to bring them home. This is not our war yet our men are being killed, a great deal of famlies are losing fathers, sons etc for unjust reasons. This is one war that Britan should not have got involved in. Please help to bring our soliders home.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
